events.message: We have received the application from Jane Doe for the software engineer position and her resume looks promising.
Jane Doe's application has been categorized under Engineering as she applied for the Software Engineer role.
Recruiter Mike Johnson has been assigned to Jane Doeâ€™s case to coordinate the upcoming recruitment steps.
The initial phone screening with Jane Doe went well; she demonstrated strong understanding of software development principles.
Jane responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the technical interview and confirming her availability next week.
Scheduled a technical interview for Jane Doe on May 10th at 2 PM with the lead software engineer.
Jane completed her technical interview successfully, solving all coding challenges and answering architecture questions confidently.
An HR interview has been scheduled with Jane for May 15th to discuss culture fit and benefits.
